FundingAwardRequirement.name: FundingAwardRequirement
FundingAwardRequirement.description: Represents a deliverable or milestone for a funding award or funding disbursement. This object is available in API version 57.0 and later.

ActionPlanTemplateId.description: The action plan template that's related to the funding award requirement and that's used for funding requirement forms.

ApprovalStatus.description: Specifies the approval status the information that's submitted against the requirements.

AssignedContactId.description: The contact who is responsible for submitting the requirement.

AssignedUserId.description: The user who submits the funding requirement.

Description.description: The description of the funding requirement.

DueDate.description: The last date and time of submitting the requirement.

FundingAwardId.description: Funding award that's associated with the funding requirement.

FundingDisbursementId.description: The funding disbursement that's associated with the requirement. The funds are disbursed only after the requirements are fulfilled.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the requirement for the funding award has been submitted (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the funding requirement.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the funding requirement.

SubmittedDate.description: The actual date and time when the requirement was submitted.

Type.description: Specifies the type of funding requirement.
